title: How to describe the word philosophy, when talking about it-self is philosophy - Quora

response.answer_text: Now thats your philosophy of rationalising!  My philosophy is to research on a subject before I have a say on it, esp.  when I have no prior knowledge about it.     ​   ​ Going completely by this quote,  you seem to be on your baby steps of becoming a philosopher !!  Letting the experts to do the debate and other honours. Resting my case!!
That's not true. Definition is not the object. Like definition of tree is not the same as tree. Similarly, definition of Philosophy is not Philosophy itself.
In a very similar manner one describes shit, (holds on to past matters instead of looking forward), when talking about itself is shit.
